message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. I believe it's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping we can come to an agreement closer to my budget. Would you consider $9,500 for the product?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. While I value the product at $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $10,500 to facilitate a deal.  This is a fair price considering its value to you. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I really appreciate it. Considering my budget, would $10,000 be possible for the product?
